Metadata.Title: CVE-2026-21941 affecting package mysql for versions less than 8.0.45-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2026-21941 affecting package mysql for versions less than 8.0.45-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package mysql is earlier than 8.0.45-1, affected by CVE-2026-21941
